name: Square Arena (itch)
description:
Square Arena is a multiplayer shooter game where you choose one of 5 characters that you want to play. Each character has its own powers. Try it yourself!

INSTRUCTIONS: - Controls:

Move: AD / Arrows

Jump: Space / W

Select Powers: 1 / 2 / 3

Emote: B

- How to play?

After creating your nickname and connecting to the server, create a room and wait for other players to join you. When you're ready, you can start the game by clicking "play" button. Only the host of a room can start the game.

- I found a bug! What do I do?

If you see any bugs, send a video or a screenshot describing it to: wikitegamedev@gmail.com and i'll try to fix it as soon as possible
